game.name: Alien Hunter 2
game.description:
Your area is under attack and the only way to save your land is to kill all your enemies. Aliens have already invaded the planet earth. The government of your country has appointed you as an Alien Hunter who has already finished many such missions in the past. Are you again ready to accept this unique challenge and save your planet from the alien invasion? Join Alien Hunter 2 and get ready to defeat all the blood-thirsty monsters with your sharp weapon handling abilities and quick reactions!

In the sequel of this brand new sci-fi adventure game, your job is to clean the area from all the deadly enemies and move further to the end point. There are 10 unique and extremely challenging levels to explore and each level consists of different and powerful monsters to deal with. A brave hunter is a main character of the game that is full of science and technology feeling. Guide him to clean up the space ships from the dangerous aliens!

Unique creatures are awaiting you in different levels and their main objective is to penetrate the Earth.  Collect as many stars as you can while keeping your eyes on the health bar in this html5 platform game! When you are going to land in an orbit, make sure to help him land him on a star and attentively go through all the compartments to check out the presence of alien species. Kill them fast as you see them since they are not going to show mercy on you! Clear all levels and have fun in this awesome action-packed RPG game! Practice your shooting abilities in our other top shooting games for kids without download!
